name: Grist Mill
description: A place where raw materials are processed or crafted; adventurers might secure specialized equipment or investigate hazardous machinery.
atmosphere: The mill is filled with the rich scent of grain and the rhythmic sound of grinding stones powered by water or wind. The air carries the promise of sustenance and the essential nature of food production, while the atmosphere is one of industrious work and the transformation of raw materials into life-sustaining flour.
